patterns: What is SITAM?
Tell me about SITAM
What is SITAM college?
What is SITAM full form?
responses: SITAM stands for **Satya Institute of Technology and Management**, affiliated with **JNTUGV** (Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University-Gurajada Vizianagaram).
SITAM is a prestigious engineering college located in Vizianagaram, established in 2008.
SITAM is an institution for excellence in education and technology, located in Vizianagaram.

patterns: Who is the director of SITAM?
director of sitam
responses: The director of SITAM is **Dr. Majji Sashi Bhushana Rao**.

patterns: Who is the principal of SITAM?
principal of sitam
who is principal of SITAM?
who is principle of SITAM?
responses: Dr.D.V. Ramamurthy is the principal of sitam

patterns: Who is the owner of SITAM?
Who founded SITAM?
Who is the owner of the college?
Who is the chairman of SITAM?

responses: SITAM is owned by **Sri Botcha Satyanarayana**.
The owner of SITAM is **Sri Botcha Satyanarayana**.
SITAM is headed by **Sri Botcha Satyanarayana**.

patterns: Who is the HOD of CSE?
Who heads the CSE department?
HOD of Computer Science and Engineering
Head of CSE
responses: The HOD of the CSE department is Dr. G. Venu Madhava Rao. He is a Professor with a Ph.D. You can reach him at drgvmr@gmail.com.

patterns: Who is the HOD of ECE?
Who heads the ECE department?
HOD of Electronics and Communication Engineering
Head of ECE
responses: The HOD of the ECE department is Dr. T. D. V. A. Naidu, a Professor with a Ph.D. You can reach him at damodar.telu@sitam.co.in.
Another HOD of the ECE department is Yedla Santhosh, an Associate Professor with M.Tech and pursuing a Ph.D. You can reach him at santhoshyedla@sitam.co.in.

patterns: Who is the HOD of MECH?
Who heads the Mechanical Engineering department?
HOD of Mechanical Engineering
Head of MECH
responses: The HOD of the Mechanical Engineering department is CH. Venkata Lakshmi, an Associate Professor with M.E in CAD/CAM and pursuing a Ph.D. You can reach her at venkatalakshmi.ch@sitam.co.in.

patterns: Who is the HOD of CIVIL?
Who heads the Civil Engineering department?
HOD of Civil Engineering
Head of CIVIL
responses: The HOD of the Civil Engineering department is Dr. G. Ravi Kishore, a Professor with a Ph.D. from IIT Kharagpur. You can reach him at ravikishore.g@sitam.co.in.

patterns: Who is the HOD of Basic Sciences and Humanities?
Who heads the BS&H department?
HOD of BS&H
Head of Basic Sciences and Humanities
responses: The HOD of the Basic Sciences and Humanities department is Dr. K. Sreelatha, a Professor in Mathematics with an M.Sc., M.Phil., and Ph.D. You can reach her at sreelatha.karanam@sitam.co.in.

patterns: Tell me about the history of SITAM.
What is the history of SITAM?
Who founded SITAM?
Give me details about SITAM's history.
responses: SITAM (Satya Institute of Technology and Management) was established in 2008 under the Gayatri Vidya Parishad Society. The society was founded by eminent educationists, academicians, and industrialists. The founder President was Professor B. Sarveswara Rao, and the second President was Dr. B. Swami. The college is known for its infrastructure, dedicated faculty, and academic excellence.

patterns: What is SITAM?
Tell me about SITAM college.
Give me details about SITAM.
responses: SITAM stands for Satya Institute of Technology and Management. It is affiliated with JNTUGV (Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University-Gurajada Vizianagaram). The college was established in 2008 and is located in Gajularega, Vizianagaram.

patterns: What courses are offered at SITAM?
Which courses are available in SITAM?
Tell me about courses at SITAM
What are the courses in SITAM?
responses: SITAM offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various engineering disciplines like CSE, ECE, Civil, and Mechanical.
At SITAM, we provide B.Tech courses in CSE, ECE, Civil Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering.
SITAM offers a wide range of courses, including B.Tech, M.Tech, and MBA in different specializations.

patterns: How can I apply for admission?
What is the admission process for SITAM?
Tell me about the admission procedure.
When does SITAM start its admissions?
responses: To apply for admission, visit our official website and fill out the application form online.
The admission process includes an entrance exam followed by counseling. Check our website for detailed instructions.
SITAM starts its admission process in May each year. Visit the admissions page on our website for further details.

patterns: What is the fee structure of SITAM?
How much is the tuition fee at SITAM?
Tell me about the fees at SITAM.
What are the hostel fees in SITAM?
responses: The fee structure for SITAM varies depending on the course and category. Please visit our website for detailed fee information.
For B.Tech students, the annual tuition fee is around ₹1,00,000. Other fees such as hostel and transportation vary.
The hostel fees for SITAM range between ₹20,000 - ₹30,000 annually.

patterns: What are the facilities available on the SITAM campus?

responses: SITAM has state-of-the-art facilities including well-equipped laboratories, sports complexes, hostels, and a library.
The SITAM campus includes hostel facilities, a fully equipped gym, sports facilities, and an advanced library.
SITAM offers various facilities such as Wi-Fi, hostels, cafeteria, transport services, and recreational areas.

patterns: What is the placement record of SITAM?

How are the placements at SITAM?
What companies visit SITAM for placements?
responses: SITAM has a strong placement record with top companies like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, and more hiring our graduates.
SITAM's placement cell works hard to get our students placed in reputed companies across India and abroad.
Our placement record is impressive, with many students securing jobs in renowned companies during campus recruitment.

patterns: What events are held at SITAM?

responses: SITAM organizes various events like technical fests, cultural programs, sports meets, and guest lectures throughout the year.
We host multiple events such as **TechFest**, **Cultural Fest**, and more. Stay updated on our website for upcoming events.
SITAM regularly hosts events, including conferences, workshops, and festivals. Check our events page for details.

patterns: What can I do after completing my degree from SITAM?

What options are available after B.Tech from SITAM?
responses: After completing your degree at SITAM, you can pursue M.Tech, MBA, or opt for various competitive exams like GATE, GRE, and CAT.
You can go for higher studies like M.Tech, MBA, or take up a job. Many students also pursue courses like Data Science or AI.
After B.Tech, you can apply for postgraduate courses, appear for competitive exams, or work in industry-leading companies.

patterns: What are the achievements of SITAM?

responses: SITAM has won numerous awards in academics, sports, and co-curricular activities, including national-level tech fests and sports competitions.
SITAM has been awarded for its outstanding academic performance and also boasts several achievements in sports and cultural events.
SITAM regularly excels in various competitions and has earned accolades in technical and cultural domains.

patterns: Who are the faculty members at SITAM?

Our faculty members are experts in various fields, with several having international exposure and research credentials.
SITAM has a dedicated team of professors and lecturers, specializing in subjects across multiple disciplines.

patterns: Where is SITAM located?
Tell me the address of SITAM.
Where can I find SITAM?
How can I reach SITAM?
responses: SITAM is located in Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh, India. It is situated near the town's outskirts, offering a peaceful learning environment.
You can reach SITAM by bus, car, or train. It is easily accessible from Vizianagaram Railway Station and the nearest bus stops.

The minimum eligibility for B.Tech admission at SITAM is 50% in the 12th grade with a valid score in the entrance exam.
